messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hop office is open also someone get power working

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hi this is your hop captain changed to clown

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Who ever wants a random acess come to hop for hop roulette

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Customs.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Guy please report to hop also acess roulette is still on

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Doctor please report to hop line also first person to bring me a gold id gets all acess

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxillary Base.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a whoop of [REDACTED] have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a whoop of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
